attributes.action: Abandon proposals to permit internal house inspections by local authority officials acting in the course of property revaluations for the purposes of setting council tax bands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: A similar petition already exists http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/revaluation/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
